## Meeting.toggleReactions() method

Method to enable or disable reactions inside the meeting.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toggleReactions(enable: boolean): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enable | boolean | enable or disable reactions |
